name: Dragons & Lands: RPG Puzzle
description:
Game Description:
The player creates and pumps his clan of dragons, with their help, he conquers the neighboring kingdoms, and collects tribute from them. To do this, he needs to win a series of victories over other players. The battle takes place with the help of the most popular game mechanics to date in a row. Collecting various combinations on the field, he activates the attacking and defensive abilities of his dragons. Attacking and defending against the dragons of the opponent.
